Uses of Interface
org.springframework.web.context.request.async.DeferredResultProcessingInterceptor

  • Packages that use DeferredResultProcessingInterceptor 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.web.context.request.async
    Support for asynchronous request processing.
    org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation
    Annotation-based setup for Spring MVC.
    org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation
    MVC infrastructure for annotation-based handler method processing, building on the org.springframework.web.method.annotation package.

    • Uses of DeferredResultProcessingInterceptor in org.springframework.web.context.request.async

      Classes in org.springframework.web.context.request.async that implement DeferredResultProcessingInterceptor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DeferredResultProcessingInterceptorAdapter
      Deprecated. 
      as of 5.0 where DeferredResultProcessingInterceptor has default methods
      class  TimeoutDeferredResultProcessingInterceptor
      Sends a 503 (SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE) in case of a timeout if the response is not already committed.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Get the DeferredResultProcessingInterceptor registered under the given key.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
